articles.title: Leinster boss Leo Cullen hits out at EPCR over 'illogical' approach - Independent.ie
articles.description: Leinster head coach Leo Cullen has blasted Heineken Champions Cup organisers European Professional Club Rugby (EPCR) for what he believes is an “illogical” approach to settling called-off matches.
